John and Lucy were playing in the park. Suddenly, they came across a large nut on the ground. 
John was very excited and began to pick it up. Lucy however, shrugged, and said there was probably nothing inside. 
John wouldn't take no for an answer, and began to tap the nut with a stick. After a few taps the nut split open, revealing something inside!
John and Lucy gasped in amazement. Inside the nut was a large, shiny coin

Once upon a time, there was a normal boy named Tom. Tom had a toy motorcycle. He loved to play with it all day.
One sunny day, Tom took his motorcycle outside to play. He made the motorcycle speed on the ground. It went very fast. Tom was so happy to see it go.
Then, Tom's friend, Tim, came to play with him. Tim had a toy car. They raced their toys together. The motorcycle and the car went speed, speed, speed. Tom and Tim laughed and played until it was time to go home. They had a fun day with their toys.

The friends decided to have a competition. They both had to wake up very early in the morning and run around the park three times. Whoever won the race would get to keep the bone. 
The pig was very competitive, so he ran and ran very fast. The dog was also fast, and so they raced neck and neck. In the end, the pig managed to outrun the dog, and he won the bone!
The dog was sad, but the pig was kind and shared the bone with his friend. They were both happy and ran around the park together!
